00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : FinalDump
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 
00035 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00050 
00051  SUBROUTINE FinalDump
00052 
00053 !  Common Variables
00054  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00055  USE Domain
00056  USE FluidParams
00057  USE MPIParams, ONLY : master, MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc
00058  USE MPI
00059  IMPLICIT NONE
00060 
00061 !  Local Variables
00062  INTEGER :: i, j
00063  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00064  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Mb, Pdif, Perr, Pin, Pout, Ro, R, Ref, Umax, Vef, Vol
00065  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: distroMem, auxMem, mpiMem, totalMem
00066  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: memUnitA, memUnitB, memUnitC, memUnitD
00067  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal
00068  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:3) :: memLocal, memGlobal
00069  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:5) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00070 
00071 
00072 ! Initialize
00073  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00074 
00075  UmaxLocal     = 0.D0
00076  UmaxGlobal    = 0.D0
00077  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00078  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00079 
00080 ! Calculate pressure inside and outside the bubble, maximum velocity in the domain and effective radius
00081  DO j = yl, yu
00082    DO i = xl, xu
00083 
00084      R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i) - bubbles(1,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j) - bubbles(1,2) )**2 )
00085      IF ( R < (Ro - IntWidth) ) THEN
00086        dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + 1.D0
00087        dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + p(i,j)
00088      ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + IntWidth) ) THEN
00089        dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + 1.D0
00090        dataLocal(5) = dataLocal(5) + p(i,j)
00091      END IF
00092 
00093      IF ( rho(i,j) < rhoStar ) dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00094 
00095      Umax = DSQRT( u(i,j,1)*u(i,j,1) + u(i,j,2)*u(i,j,2) )
00096      IF ( Umax > UmaxLocal ) UmaxLocal = Umax
00097 
00098    END DO
00099  END DO
00100 
00101 ! Gather global data
00102  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00103  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00104  Vol = dataGlobal(1)
00105 
00106 ! Calculate compliance with Laplace Law
00107  Pin  = dataGlobal(4)/dataGlobal(2)
00108  Pout = dataGlobal(5)/dataGlobal(3)
00109  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00110  Perr = (sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00111 
00112 ! Calculate phase conservation
00113  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00114  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00115 
00116 ! Estimate memory usage (Mb)
00117  Mb       = 1.D0/( 1024.D0*1024.D0 )
00118  memUnitA = NX*NY
00119  memUnitB = ( NX + 2 )*( NY + 2 )
00120  memUnitC = ( NX + 4 )*( NY + 4 )
00121  memUnitD = ( NX + 6 )*( NY + 6 )
00122 
00123  memLocal(1) = 8.D0*36.D0*memUnitB
00124  memLocal(2) = 8.D0*( 9.D0*memUnitB + memUnitC + memUnitD ) + 4.D0*4.D0*memUnitC
00125  memLocal(3) = 8.D0*( 12.D0*( xsize3 + ysize3 ) )
00126 
00127  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(memLocal, memGlobal, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00128  distroMem = memGlobal(1)*Mb
00129  auxMem    = memGlobal(2)*Mb
00130  mpiMem    = memGlobal(3)*Mb
00131  totalMem  = distroMem + auxMem + mpiMem
00132 
00133 ! Save data to file from the master node only
00134  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00135    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "final.out", STATUS = "NEW", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00136         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00137    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00138      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Multiphase Lee-Lim LBM 2D Simulation    ***'
00139      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Standard Implementation (MPI Parallel)  ***'
00140      WRITE(10,*)
00141      WRITE(10,'(A)')'INPUT PARAMETERS'
00142      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Iterations      = ',MaxStep+1
00143      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Relaxation Iterations = ',RelaxStep+1
00144      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in X Direction = ',xmax
00145      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in Y Direction = ',ymax
00146      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Width       = ',IntWidth
00147      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interfacial Tension   = ',sigma
00148      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauL   = ',tauL
00149      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauH   = ',tauH
00150      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoL   = ',rhoL
00151      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoH   = ',rhoH
00152      WRITE(10,*)
00153      WRITE(10,'(A)')'MEMORY USAGE (Mb)'
00154      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Distributions     = ',distroMem
00155      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Auxiliary Arrays  = ',auxMem
00156      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'MPI Buffer Arrays = ',mpiMem
00157      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Total Memory Used = ',totalMem
00158      WRITE(10,*)
00159      WRITE(10,'(A)')'OUTPUT RESULTS (RELAXATION)'
00160      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Effective Radius   = ',Ref
00161      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Phase Conservation = ',Vef
00162      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'(Pin - Pout)       = ',Pdif
00163      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Laplace Error      = ',Perr
00164      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Parasitic Velocity = ',UmaxGlobal
00165      WRITE(10,*)
00166      WRITE(10,'(A)')'***    Simulation Finished Succesfully      ***'
00167      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00168    ELSE
00169      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00170      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00171      STOP "Error: unable to open output file 'final.out'."
00172    END IF
00173  END IF
00174  
00175  RETURN
00176  END SUBROUTINE FinalDump
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:25 2008 for LL-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
